org.apache.flink.yarn

类 YarnClusterClientV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
      • org.apache.flink.yarn.YarnClusterClientV2

  • public class YarnClusterClientV2
extends ClusterClient
    Java representation of a running Flink job on YARN. Since flip-6, a flink job will be run as a yarn job by default, each job has a jobmaster, so this class will be used as a client to communicate with yarn and start the job on yarn.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient

      • YarnClusterClientV2

        public YarnClusterClientV2(AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor clusterDescriptor,
                           Configuration flinkConfig)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a client to communicate with YARN cluster.
        参数:
        clusterDescriptor - The descriptor used to create yarn job
        flinkConfig - Flink configuration
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the cluster client could not be created

      • waitForClusterToBeReady

        public void waitForClusterToBeReady()
        从类复制的说明: ClusterClient
        Blocks until the client has determined that the cluster is ready for Job submission.

        This is delayed until right before job submission to report any other errors first (e.g. invalid job definitions/errors in the user jar)

        指定者:
        waitForClusterToBeReady 在类中 ClusterClient

      • getJobManagerAddress

        覆盖:
        getJobManagerAddress 在类中 ClusterClient
        返回:
        The address (host and port) of the leading JobManager
